My name is Benjy and I’m a user experience designer

I’m the lead user experience designer on the Office for National Statistics (ONS) website. Check out the ONS digital blog.

I started a design meet-up in Swansea. I have 3 kids, and when I’m not working, I like to spend time in The Great Outdoors or listening to music.
